title: Peoples attitude in lobbies
body: 4 times today I have had to swap from jungle into another role doesn't matter what champ I pick like fkn j4 support and BS because some kid thats a lower pick than me has an attitude problem and will just pick jungle anyway and flame team. Can we start seeing some harsher punishments for this type of behaviour

replies.body: The thing is though that the META and pick/call order are things the player base came up with, they're not things enforced by Riot and that means that it's up to the players to sort out those issues and their strategy in-game. Attitude and abuse Riot does punish, not obeying the META and/or pick/call order Riot doesn't punish.
I think pick order in rank was riot made.
The system pick order is based on is made by Riot but pick order itself is community made. Fact is people could have still used call order, but they didn't.
Ye the original one was made by people, but I mean like the current one is enforced by riot right?

If I'm not mistaken pick order isn't something Riot enforces as such. They may like the idea and, on a personal level, think it should be enforced but I'm pretty sure it's not punishable if someone doesn't obey pick order.
